class.name: CovarianceRandomDraw

javadoc.text: Generates random vectors based on a zero mean multivariate Gaussian distribution. The covariance * matrix is provided in the contructor.
Creates a random distribution with the specified mean and covariance. The references * to the variables are not saved, their value are copied.
javadoc.param: rand Used to create the random numbers for the draw. Reference is saved.
cov The covariance of the stribution. Not modified.

javadoc.text: Makes a draw on the distribution. The results are added to parameter 'x'
Computes the likelihood of the random draw
